replies.author: AD【钙奶】
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 AD【钙奶】 于 2020-2-21 16:12 编辑 

删除坐标-6417,12,1819     (-6402,67,1871）   -6416,65,1839  的实体
你这错误方块太多了

服务器根目录找到forge.cfg
把
    B:removeErroringEntities=false

    B:removeErroringTileEntities=false
改为

    B:removeErroringEntities=true

    B:removeErroringTileEntities=true

replies.author: 酥宁最酥啦
replies.txt_content: 服务端内的mod不能使用客户端的辅助mod  服务端mods的辅助mod试试  自定义合成表

replies.author: 名副其实
replies.txt_content:
Exception getting block type in worldGenerating a chunk in world world took longer than 10 seconds, Thermos needs to crash so the server doesn't time out...sorry!
读取区块时发生错误，请重新生成world

replies.author: Boring_dada
replies.txt_content: 你把世界全删了就可以
